channel.title: Webclient help willing to pay 2£ if solved
channel.description: I am using insidiaX client and would like to upload it to the internet to make it a webclient, if you goto http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=512994.0 it says "webclient ready" but im not sure how im meant to upload it, so if anyone can help i will pay 2£ you can add my skype - bionicmoneyk0 or just post how to fix below and ill pm you and send you the money via paypal once this problem is solved

Your Webclient [/code]

You gota upload the Jar file to the Place where your website is going to be. e.g. uploading your client to 000webhost.com you need to make another file in that website called play.php and you add the HTML code there

item.title: Webclient help willing to pay 2£ if solved
item.dc:creator: @RS2BullDog RS2BullDog
item.description:
@RS2BullDog wrote:

[quote=“complexg, post:1, topic:436878”]I am using insidiaX client and would like to upload it to the internet to make it a webclient,
if you goto http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=512994.0
it says “webclient ready” but im not sure how im meant to upload it,
so if anyone can help i will pay 2£ you can add my skype - bionicmoneyk0 or just post how to fix below and ill pm you and send you the money via paypal once this problem is solved[/quote]

Upload the Jar File to your host and get the HTML code for the web client (In the client area). Make sure you putted the Client.Jar in the HTML file so it can be found on your Host. If your just going to let people download the Jar. Just make sure that the Jar runs.

P.S

complexg:

so if anyone can help i will pay 2£

You can’t pay people for needing help and most of the people here are American so it will be $ not £

Read full topic
